title: 820-3476 trackpad movement not working
message:
Very clean board no apparent liquid damage, the trackpad does not move the cursor but it does register the clicks.
Tried a new pad and cable no change, there were some crumbs magically around the SMC so I reflowed and ultrasonic'ed, no change.
Not really sure what lines control the pad movement.
Fails detect trackpad in ASD 162

R4808 - 3.33v
L4807 - 5.14v
U4801 Pin 24 - up and down 1.6 to 3.33, which Im guessing isn't right?

So is it likely the U4801 (looks clean on surface) needs to replaced or the SMC needs to be replaced/reballed? anything else to look at?

title: 820-3476 trackpad movement not working
message: Why not measure some basic voltages at the trackpad connector?

title: 820-3476 trackpad movement not working
message:
Pin 5 can of course never be 5V but that would only affect the thermal sensor and trackpad should work. Double check pin 5!
Also do a diode mode on all the pins. Voltages look ok besides pin 5 for now.

title: 820-3476 trackpad movement not working
message: I have no idea how you measure 1.26 in diode mode, did you have red probe to GND?
